comparison.description: How the breath / air / bubble bar (in ticks) should be compared to the specified value.
comparison.markdownDescription: How the breath / air / bubble bar (in ticks) should be compared to the specified value.

compare_to.description: Which value the breath should be compared to.
compare_to.markdownDescription: Which value the breath should be compared to.

type.description:
## Air

---



[Entity Condition Type](https://origins.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/entity_condition_types/air)

Checks how much breath / air / bubble the entity has at the moment.

Type ID: `origins:air`



---

### üìù Note

Players (and most mobs) have a max value of 300 ticks, whilst dolphins have a max value of 4800 ticks. Axolotls, on the other hand, have a max value of 6000 ticks.



    In order to get the value of a single bubble, you can divide the max value by 10. (`max / 10 = value`)




---

### Examples

```json
"condition": {
    "type": "origins:air",
    "comparison": "==",
    "compare_to": 0
}
```

This example will check if the player has no breath / air / bubbles left.
